      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Creates and displays a new game.

      • defeat

        public void defeat()
        Method that is called when a mine is clicked by user. Ends the game.

      • start

        public void start()
        Method that is called when start button is clicked. First checks for validity of arguments, then calls initialize() with new params if arguments are valid and displays error message otherwise.

        Helper method to create main top bar (HBox)

      • mousePressed

        public void mousePressed(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
        Helper method to handle mousePressed action; sets origin of click + changes cursor type
        Parameters:
        e - The triggered MouseEvent

      • zoom

        public void zoom(double delta)
        Helper method to change scale of GridPane when zoomed > Delta is changed to either -1.0 or 1.0 > Tests for either one > Checks for zoom bounds > If satisfies, changes scale according to first calc.
        Parameters:
        delta - Y-Delta of mouse scroll; either -40.0 (down) or 40.0 (up)

      • getTile

        public Tile getTile(int row,
                    int column)
        Searches the game GridPane for a tile object and returns the row & column that it appears in, or null if it does not exist.
        Parameters:
        row - Row of tile being searched for
        column - Column of tile being searched for
        Returns:
        minesweeper.Tile at pos row, column; null if tile does not exist

        Current minesweeper.Minesweeper game
